original_text: Then shalt thou lay up gold as dust, and the gold of Ophir as the stones of the brooks.
korean_text: 네 보화를 티끌로 여기고 오빌의 금을 계곡의 돌로 여기라

sentences.original_text: Then shalt thou lay up gold as dust
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너는 금을 먼지처럼 쌓을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the gold of Ophir as the stones of brooks
